page.title: 12A typical ten-year old boy
page.content: My name is Andrew McCulloch. I was born in 1975 and go to Cavendish Junior School. I like sport generally but especially ju-jitsu in which I have a yellow belt and hope to get my green belt soon. I collect stamps and have 150 First Day Covers. I also collect sticker albums and like going to visit places where I can get autographs of famous people. I like computers, fairs and dogs but I hate bananas and custard! I have got an Acorn Electron computer on which I play games such as 'Killer Gorilla', 'Escape from Moon Base Alpha' and 'Felix in the Factory'. I also watch the television quite a bit, my favourite programmes being 'He Man', 'Street Hawk' and 'Knight Rider'.
